item.title: Processing Delays - AT&T
item.content:encoded:
High - AT&T Device Connections Issue

Summary: AT&T is experiencing an uptick in device connections, affecting GPS points and Event Upload speeds. They are working with the wireless carrier to resolve the issue.

Feb 22, 10:36 PST
Identified - We are seeing an uptick in device connections for AT&T which is affecting GPS points and Event Upload speeds.
We continue to work closely with our wireless carrier as they make progress towards a resolution.
We thank you for your patience.

item.title: Login Page - Full Outage
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Service Interruption at login.lytx.com

Summary: Users are experiencing a DNS error upon login and cannot proceed. The issue is currently being investigated.

Feb 21, 06:23 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 21, 04:58 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 21, 04:51 PST
Investigating - We’re currently investigating a service interruption impacting login.lytx.com. You may receive a DNS error upon login and will not be able to move forward. We apologize for any inconvenience and will post another update as soon as we learn more.

item.title: Partial Outage: SSO login
item.content:encoded:
Feb 16, 08:03 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 16, 07:42 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 16, 06:09 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue for customers leveraging our SSO login feature. Currently, SSO login-enabled customers may be taken to an incorrect login page and unable to access Lytx Account. This issue does not impact customers' ability to use login.lytx.com if their company is not leveraging the SSO feature.

item.title: Fleet Tracking - Processing Delays (API)
item.content:encoded:
Jan 8, 13:00 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 8, 12:18 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 8, 11:27 PST
Identified - For some clients, GPS push data processing is running behind causing GPS points data to be stale. No data has been lost and the system should be caught up shortly.

item.title: Fleet Tracking - Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
Jan 3, 16:09 PST
Resolved - Thank you for your patience as we worked on resolving this Fleet Tracking data issue. Any missing data from January 1st through January 3rd (approximately 10:30 AM PST) will be back filled through next week, therefore some clients may continue to observe blank data for Stopped vehicles for this date range.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Support at 1 866-910-0403 or support.lytx.com

Jan 3, 15:23 PST
Update - Thank you for your continued patience as our Developers worked on a resolution to this issue. Most clients should now see an improvement in real-time fleet tracking, however we are continuing to monitoring functionality. This issue should be resolved shortly.

Jan 3, 13:07 PST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. Actively moving vehicles are now updating, however Stopped vehicles still need some time to update. We will post another update once we have more information.

Jan 3, 10:54 PST
Monitoring - We appreciate your patience as our Developers worked on a resolution to this issue. A fix is already initiated, and we are monitoring functionality. We will post another update once the issue is Resolved.

Jan 3, 09:35 PST
Identified - An issue with live map data for Fleet Tracking has been identified. Some clients may experience an issue viewing real-time fleet tracking data within the last 24 hours. The data is available within the Fleet Tracking history option depending on the historical timeframe selected. Our teams are working to restore normal functionality as quickly as possible and do apologize for the inconvenience.

item.title: Driver Safety - Events Issue Outage
item.content:encoded:
Dec 7, 10:37 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 7, 10:04 PST
Update - This issue has been downgraded to a partial outage. Thank you for your patience while we continue to investigate the issue. Please note, the audio issue is not present when the video is downloaded to DCE or MP4.

Dec 7, 09:46 PST
Investigating - We’re currently investigating reports of a potential service interruption while viewing Events in Driver Safety. Some clients will experience issues loading video, while others may be missing the audio button. We apologize for any inconvenience and will post another update as soon as we learn more.

item.content:encoded:

Some clients will receive in an Access Denied or "Sorry, you have been blocked" error message which will impact your ability to log into your Lytx Account. We apologize for any inconvenience and will post another update as soon as we learn more.

item.title: Fleet Tracking - Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 1, 11:44 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been Resolved.

Nov 1, 10:12 PDT
Identified - We have identified an issue where some vehicles may not show historical data, trip data and breadcrumb points within Fleet Tracking. Vehicle location data is still available within history mode. Our teams are working to restore normal functionality as quickly as possible and do apologize for the inconvenience.
